scripts.makeDirs: mkdir -p cimmenu/lib && mkdir -p cimsvg/lib && mkdir -p cimmenu/generated && mkdir -p dist
scripts.cimsvg: cd cimsvg && npm install && npm run build
scripts.cimmenu: cd cimmenu && npm install && npm run build
scripts.libs: npm run cimsvg && npm run cimmenu
scripts.build-tasks: npm run makeDirs && npm run libs && npm run generateIndex
scripts.build: npm run build-tasks && npm run makeDist
scripts.build-dev: npm config set mode debug && npm run build
